name: Edamame Pasta Meal
description: This Edamame Pasta Meal is a powerhouse of nutrition, perfect for those seeking a delicious, healthified option. Packed with high-protein and high-fiber ingredients, it's a scrumptious choice for anyone wanting to enjoy healthy recipes without compromising on taste.
recipeIngredient: 25 g 1 ear, Veggie - Corn on the Cob
4  beans (4" long), Beans, snap, green, raw

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by preparing your ingredients: snap the beans into 1-inch pieces, slice the banana blossom, dice the carrot, and shave the corn off the cob.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, melt butter and virgin coconut oil over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced carrot, beans, banana blossom, and shaved corn to the pan. Sauté for 10 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a separate pot, cook the edamame pasta according to package instructions, usually taking about 8 minutes, then drain.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the belly into thin strips and sauté in a pan with extra virgin olive oil until crispy, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked pasta, sautéed vegetables, and crispy belly in a large bowl. Drizzle with fresh squeezed lemon juice, organic soy sauce, honey, and cane vinegar. Toss well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Top the pasta with finely grated sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, and sprinkle squid ink over the dish for an enhanced flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
